description: Try our easy to follow Quick Vegetable Mole recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Halal,Seafood free,Wheat free,Egg free,Peanut free
name: Quick Vegetable Mole Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into small chunks
1 large red capsicum, cored, deseeded and chopped
400g can red kidney beans, drained and rinsed
400g can black beans, drained and rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large saucepan, add the onion and garlic and cook over a medium heat for 2-3 minutes until softened. Add the sweet potatoes and red capsicumand cook for 2 minutes.

Stir in the chilli powder, tomatoes, stock and all the beans and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat, cover and simmer gently for 20-25 minutes until the vegetables are tender. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Add the chocolate and coriander and cook for a further 2-3 minutes. Serve with long-grain rice topped with spoonfuls of soured cream.
